title: SC rejects Adani Power's plea to recover Rs 1,376 crore from Rajasthan discom
description: While imposing a fine of Rs 50,000 on Adani Power for effectively seeking review of the case through a miscellaneous application seeking clarification, a Bench comprising justices Anirudhha Bose and Sanjay Kumar said a miscellaneous application was not the proper legal course when seeking a review.
